page.title: 19CHRISTS HOSPITAL STATION
page.content: Between the village of Southwater and the community around Christs Hospital school is a small British Rail Station. This is mainly used by{commuters}to and from London,seldom by boys from the school(although they do use it at the begining and end of term) The railway line which passes through the station connects{London with the coast at{Bognor Regis and {Portsmouth.}There are{fourteen trains each way per day, between the hours of 7.00am and 8.10pm, except on Saturdays when the service is reduced to seven trains each way.On Sundays and Bank Holidays no trains stop here. {Two people}work full time on shift rota at the signal box. The station consists of one main building, containing a waiting room and office, and a signal box.
